description.lang: Inovelli's Indoor Smart Switch (Dimming) has the ability to turn on and off lights (as well as dim them), from anywhere in the world. In addition the smart switch acts as a Z-Wave signal repeater, which amplifies your Z-Wave signal, growing the capabilities of your network. One of our favorite features of this switch is its ability to turn on scenes (compatible HUB/Gateway's only). Imagine activating a bedtime scene that turns off all your lights, locks your doors, and sets your temperature to 68 all with a double tap.Simplifying lives, one smart home product at a time... that's Inovelli.
